previewArticle.title: Vancouver Whitecaps vs. Sporting Kansas City | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Vancouver Whitecaps 2, Sporting KC 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Vancouver Whitecaps vs. Sporting Kansas City

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Foul by Andy O'Brien (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Jacob Peterson (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 9': Koffie picks up a foul for knocking over Feilhaber ten yards shy of midfield in the #VWFC end

timelineItems.name: Megan Castellan
timelineItems.text: There is one VAN player who looks like he has a hamster on his head. Just a giant, furry rodent, lying across his skull. #VANvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Graham Zusi.

timelineItems.name: Michael McColl
timelineItems.text: Just my weekly reminder that Laba, Fernandez and Koffie will be suspended if they pick up a yellow card today!

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 10' Feilhaber is INCHES away from giving @SportingKC a lead! His curling effort from 22 yards bends juuust past the far right post! #VANvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Sporting Kansas City. Benny Feilhaber tries a through ball, but Dominic Dwyer is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Erik Hurtado (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Sebastian Fernandez with a through ball.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 13' Uncomfortable moment for SKC as Hurtado beats Gruenebaum to a long ball over the top, but Sinovic cuts out the subsequent cross.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: @downthebyline Some knocks will make you do that, too. Collin seems to have a knock for taking those in the ... place that makes you hurl.

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 13': A flurry of chances for #VWFC as Hurtado's speed creates havoc for #SKC. Almost beat Gruenebaum to a loose ball and put it behind him

timelineItems.desc: Goal for Vancouver Whitecaps! Igor Juliao (Sporting Kansas City) puts it in his own net.
timelineItems.title: OWN GOAL: Igor Juliao heads it into his own net from outside the box

timelineItems.comment: Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jorge Claros (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Tim Froh
timelineItems.text: Better from Gruenebaum coming off his line, but he's got to hold onto that. Not inspiring much confidence tonight. #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: 15' - Game warming up quickly to the hot summer temperatures outside... Feels like this might a good advert for @MLS today... #VANvSKC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Trask
timelineItems.text: OWN GOAL!!!!! #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Two OGs from Igor Juliao this  year, but that's on the keeper to call.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Igor Julião (Sporting Kansas City).
Sebastian Fernandez (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 17' Unfortunate own goal from Igor Juliao, whose defensive header floats over Gruenebaum and into the net. 1-0 #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: Vancouver grabs a 1-0 lead behind an own goal in the 18th minute #VANvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Sean Curry
timelineItems.text: That's what happens when Juliao tries to play defense, I guess #vanvskc

timelineItems.name: Jeff
timelineItems.text: In Igor's defense, it was a well placed header... #SKC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Bennyyy. Inches. #VANvSKC http://t.co/lpmf3KuNZo

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps. Matías Laba tries a through ball, but Erik Hurtado is caught offside.
Match ends, Vancouver Whitecaps 2, Sporting Kansas City 0.

timelineItems.name: Steve Walsh
timelineItems.text: Sporting played awful in the first half. Own goal and gave up another. Second half the ref beat us. #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: FT - @WhitecapsFC claim first-ever win over @SportingKC in @MLS. Good all-around performance to start the month of August. #VANvSKC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Jacob Martella
timelineItems.text: FULL TIME: #VAN 2, #SKC 0 - Whitecaps continue to stay in the playoff race with a big home 3 points. #VANvSKC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: #VWFC snap @SportingKC's 5-game road win streak with convincing 2-0 victory. http://t.co/ABrB2Tln8O #VANvSKC http://t.co/6Rn9YmPtBq

timelineItems.desc: Overall table leaders Sporting Kansas City continue their hunt for the Supporters Shield as they travel to BC Place to take on a Vancouver Whitecaps team that has not won in five games.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Vancouver Whitecaps vs. Sporting Kansas City | August 10, 2014

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: HIGHLIGHTS: #VWFC hand @SportingKC their first loss since May. http://t.co/cfgAfQYj3D #VANvSKC http://t.co/vDxD1gcWbE

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Mikey Lopez (Sporting Kansas City).
Gershon Koffie (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps. Pedro Morales tries a through ball, but Sebastian Fernandez is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Jacob Martella
timelineItems.text: 17': GOAL #VWFC! Juliao knocks the ball into his own net and the home side is up early. 1-0 #VAN. #VANvSKC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Kekeli
timelineItems.text: Beautiful goal at bc place. Gotta love those own goals. "That's what you get for ugly jerseys," said @leanne_smith25 #itsallyourfault #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 22': #SKC midfielder Mikey Lopez just took down Koffie

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 22' Lopez with an aggressive foul on Koffie. Vancouver with a free kick 45 yards from goal on the left side.

timelineItems.desc: Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Dom Dwyer collides with Leveron

timelineItems.name: Phillip Bupp
timelineItems.text: For the record, I still like Juliao, he just needs to communicate. Remember #SKC fans, many of you wanted him over Myers a few weeks ago.

timelineItems.name: Russell Arbuthnot
timelineItems.text: Morales with a couple of uncharacteristic misfires tonight. Not a big deal, just an oddity. #VWFC #whitecapsfc

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 24' Zusi showing his class with a strong run down the left. His cross is headed clear by O'Brien. SKC still on the ball... 1-0 #VANvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Gershon Koffie (Vancouver Whitecaps) because of an injury.
Foul by Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City).
Johnny Leveron (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 25': Kendall Waston, #VWFC's newest backline addition, was shown on the jumbotron, and now the crowd is chanting his name.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Bit puzzled by that yellow on Dwyer. Didn't see a selfie anywhere.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 25' Dwyer shown a yellow card after fouling Leveron near the corner flag. Didn't look like much contact. 1-0 #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Elliott
timelineItems.text: Unbelievable yellow card on Dom Dwyer there. #SKC

timelineItems.comment: Mikey Lopez (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Johnny Leveron (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.name: Tim Froh
timelineItems.text: This ref is amazing. Dangerous tackle from behind? Verbal caution. 50-50 challenge? Yellow card. Wut. #VANvSKC #MLS

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 27' Zusi zips a clever ball to the feet of Peterson just outside the box, but he loses out and Vancouver has it. 1-0 #VANvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.title: SAVE: Andy Gruenebaum prevents his team from going down by two

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 28' Lopez does well to draw a foul 25 yards from goal, beyond the right edge of the penalty area. Chance beckons... 1-0 #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 2' Fernandez tries to cut into the middle from the left wing and Juliao gets a foot in to dispossess in SKC's defensive third.

timelineItems.name: Jacob Martella
timelineItems.text: 1': It's under way in Canada between #VWFC and #SKC. #VANvSKC #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) left footed shot from the center of the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Darren Mattocks has a golden chance foiled by Collin

timelineItems.name: Doran Stucky
timelineItems.text: Umm...Leveron kicking Dwyer's foot because he got there first is not a yellow card for Dwyer. #Sorry #ThatsRidiculous #VANvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Andy Gruenebaum gets low to keep out Morales’ free kick

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City).
Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 30': #SKC hits a body in front from 30ish yards out. No worries

timelineItems.name: Megan Castellan
timelineItems.text: THAT IS HOW WE STOP THE GOALS. Now if only we could score them…in the other team’s goal, preferably. #VANvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 29' Feilhaber taps it into the path of Dwyer, whose left-footed rocket hit a Vancouver hand inside the box. Unintentional, no PK. #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 31': Another great chance for Mattocks as a ball bounces to him in the #SKC box, but his one-time shot can't beat Gruenebaum

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City).
Steven Beitashour (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 31': And Morales delivers a beautiful #VWFC free kick that the #SKC keeper has to dive to stop.

timelineItems.name: Colyn Brackhahn
timelineItems.text: You have to put your balls into that clearance... #VANvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Matt Besler (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 32' Gruenebaum with another big save! This time he dives to block Morales' near post free kick... 1-0 #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: 102.5 The FAN
timelineItems.text: Andy G is playing with a lot of confidence. No way can you take away his starting spot when Kronberg returns. #VANvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Seth Sinovic.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Vermes not sugarcoating: "We're not playing well," he tells @JakeYadrich.

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 34': #VWFC corner upcoming, and they've got the run of the play in the last few minutes.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps. Pedro Morales tries a through ball, but Darren Mattocks is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 34' Hurtado tries to cross near the right corner flag and Sinovic blocks out for a corner kick. SKC defends it comfortably. 1-0 #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Michael Jindrich
timelineItems.text: #vanvskc Maybe it's SuperMoon that's causing Igor to play so poorly tonight...

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from more than 35 yards is too high.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Pedro Morales tries to catch Gruenebaum off his line from distance

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Aurélien Collin.

timelineItems.name: Pat Guldenpfennig
timelineItems.text: Sighs, eye rolls and groans are about to give way to shouting at the TV. Come on, boys! #SKC

timelineItems.name: VanCityVilla
timelineItems.text: “Whitecaps don’t want this to be a game of missed opportunities “- @LukeWileman. That’s our Vancouver Whitecaps to a tee. #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 36' Good pressure from the hosts results in an SKC turnover. Mattocks breaks down the right and his cross flashes through the box untouched

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from more than 35 yards is too high. Assisted by Jordan Harvey.

timelineItems.name: Tim Froh
timelineItems.text: If you've ever wondered why MLS is such an aggressive, physical league, just watch this referee work in this #VANvSKC match.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Vancouver Whitecaps 2, Sporting Kansas City 0. Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Pedro Morales.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Darren Mattocks finishes off a lethal breakaway

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Sebastian Fernandez.
Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Aurélien Collin.

timelineItems.name: Trask
timelineItems.text: Darren, you beauty you. #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Tyler Green
timelineItems.text: Fantastic play from Morales to draw in Collin and get the pass over to Mattocks. Solid finish. 2-0 #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Jarred
timelineItems.text: Hey @MLS, Pedro Morales is a REAL All Star! @WhitecapsFC #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Ken
timelineItems.text: Once again the hard work of @DarrenMattocks pays off...dudes been the hardest worker in this first half #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: Vancouver adds another as Mattocks gets on the board. 2-0 to the home side. #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Derek Noll
timelineItems.text: What's the goalkeeper supposed to do about these goals? Nothing. Horrendous effort from the defense so far. #SKC

timelineItems.name: Jacob Martella
timelineItems.text: 39': GOAL #VWFC! Mattocks slots it home to double the Vancouver lead. 2-0 #VAN. #VANvSKC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Mattocks makes no mistake. 2-0, @WhitecapsFC. #VANvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps. Andy O'Brien tries a through ball, but Sebastian Fernandez is caught offside.
Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Matt Besler (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: LuandaLoνe
timelineItems.text: Hmmm how about subbing right at the beginning of 2nd half #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: @BradShapiroKC OG wasn't his fault. Guy has his eye on ball, tracking for back-header, it's on GK to call the situation.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 44' Besler clips Morales from behind and is whistled for a foul. Vancouver free kick in their own half.

timelineItems.name: MLS Atheist
timelineItems.text: I've heard/read a decent amount of praise for Matias Laba this year, but Gershon Koffie has been a beast as well. #VANvSKC

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Jacob Peterson (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Jacob Peterson fires into the arms of Ousted

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Sebastian Fernandez (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from the center of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Aurelien Collin sprints back to clear the shot off the line

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Matt Besler.
Attempt blocked. Sebastian Fernandez (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Pedro Morales with a through ball.

timelineItems.name: David Dir
timelineItems.text: dominant performance so far vs very good KC team, Vermes will read them riot act for turnovers but maybe VAN best half if year #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Shauna
timelineItems.text: Is Collin the only one playing tonight? Yikes. #SKC @SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Byrrrne
timelineItems.text: We have been spoiled but #skc does not look good! Unorganized in back and lethargic in attack.

timelineItems.name: Johnny Gamm
timelineItems.text: Collin! That was amazing! #SKC

timelineItems.name: Aaron Sloan
timelineItems.text: Awful first half from sporting, awful from the ref... Collin playing ridiculous though #skc

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Jacob Peterson (Sporting Kansas City) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Graham Zusi.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Oh man. What was better: the Morales pass or the Collin goal-line clearance? #VANvSKC

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Vancouver Whitecaps 2, Sporting Kansas City 0.

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: HT - Good 45 minutes of entertainment at @bcplace, with @WhitecapsFC full value for the lead at the break...could have been more... #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Jonathan Tannenwald
timelineItems.text: Whitecaps fans didn't want him to RT @stevocaldwell: How did Pedro Morales from #VWFC not make it to the all star game!

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: @SportingKC look rattled and uncomfortable with the pressure that the 'Caps applied on them in midfield. How will they respond? #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Jacob Martella
timelineItems.text: HALF TIME: #VAN 2, #SKC 0 - Strong first 45 from the Whitecaps. KC not helping #FCDallas. #VANvSKC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Pedro Morales is good at soccer. #VANvSKC http://t.co/mUHKazUl3h

timelineItems.name: Rob Trainor
timelineItems.text: The other glaring weakness for @SportingKC tonite is Besler's fledgling goatee. Does #SKC have a traveling barber? #HotTowel #LatherUp

timelineItems.name: Rituro
timelineItems.text: Still, a 2-0 lead after 45' is beyond my wildest dreams. Fantastic start for @WhitecapsFC. #VWFC #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: Moments away from the restart here at BC Place. SKC will hope to put that first half behind them entirely and cut into the 2-0 deficit.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: HIGHLIGHT: Morales + Mattocks link up beautifully for #VWFC's 2nd goal. http://t.co/8qKGR5VPdO #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Peter Elliott
timelineItems.text: Vermes comeback plan: intentional ejection for Juliao in 46', shift to 3-4-2 formation w/ ten men, win game by five goals. #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Chris Bruntlett
timelineItems.text: Our home and native land. #VWFC http://t.co/in0G8DDJjh

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: SUB: Homegrown goalkeeper @JonKempin21 makes his @MLS debut comes on for @gbaum30 to start the second half.

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Vancouver Whitecaps 2, Sporting Kansas City 0.
Steven Beitashour (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City).
Attempt saved. Jacob Peterson (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Dominic Dwyer.

timelineItems.name: Tyler Million
timelineItems.text: Gruenebaum out. Kempin in. MLS debut for Kempin. Let's get it boys! #skc

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: Halftime SUB: injured @gbaum30 is replaced by homegrown goalkeeper @JonKempin21, who makes his @MLS debut for @SportingKC. #VANvSKC

timelineItems.text: This may just very well be Save of the Week: http://t.co/HQL8Ai20C4 #VANvSKC

timelineItems.text: Different game from van for me 2nt. Not just 100mph press but good ball movement and creativity, Not over but NICE #VANvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Aurélien Collin (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.text: 'Caps need to test sub KC keeper Jon Kempin at some point... #VANvSKC #MLS

timelineItems.text: 64': Collin gets his head on a great #SKC corner, but puts it just above the bar. #tooclose

timelineItems.text: 64' Collin gets on the end of Zusi's high-arching corner, but his header grazes the top of the net and out of play. 2-0 #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: @SportingKC add an attacker to the mix with CJ Sapong, while #VWFC put on Mehdi Ballouchy for a battered @Etado19... #VANvSKC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Aaron Smail
timelineItems.text: Good to see Mhedi Ballouchy coming on #VWFC

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Johnny Leveron (Vancouver Whitecaps) header from the center of the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Benny Feilhaber heads it off the line

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Aurélien Collin.
Steven Beitashour (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: kendall
timelineItems.text: Atop the Supporters Shield race and the Eastern Conference. Sittin pretty, but we can't let up! #SKC #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Johnny Leveron (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Richard Williams
timelineItems.text: SKC's double blue hoops kit are pretty sweet but the Cap's will still pull out a victory today #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Johnny Leveron (Vancouver Whitecaps) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Pedro Morales with a cross.
Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps. Mehdi Ballouchy tries a through ball, but Sebastian Fernandez is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 69' Fernandez tries to maneuver past Sinovic down the right byline and Collin slides over to force a corner kick.

timelineItems.name: Tyler Green
timelineItems.text: 20,183 is the attendance of the #WhitecapsFC v #SKC match at @bcplace today

timelineItems.comment: Gershon Koffie (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City).
Attempt saved. Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Graham Zusi with a cross.
Delay in match Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) because of an injury.
Delay in match Jordan Harvey (Vancouver Whitecaps) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Erin McConnell
timelineItems.text: I had to stop watching the #VANvSKC game due to being emotionally distraught about how it was going. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 73' SKC with a long spell of possession in the attacking half. Zusi crosses for Feilhaber, whose open header is straight at Ousted! #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Head knocks. Never like to see those.

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Jacob Peterson (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: Harvey and Feilhaber collide going for the ball in the 'Caps box. Botk seem fine, but it was enough to make one cringe... #VANvSKC #MLS

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 76' Morales attempts to whip a free kick into the penalty area, and Lopez does well to block as the one-man wall. 2-0 #VANvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Sebastian Fernandez.

timelineItems.name: Tim Froh
timelineItems.text: Andy Gruenebaum nearly punished for coming off his line there. You have to either get that ball or stay on your line. #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 7' Dwyer wins SKC a free kick 45 yards from goal. Feilhaber takes it quickly and Leveron intercepts near the penalty arc.

timelineItems.name: Megan Castellan
timelineItems.text: I must give grudging respect to whoever made the Hypnotoad sign in the Whitecap stadium. #allHailtheHypnoToad #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: Final sub for #SportingKC as @SoonySaad comes on for @jacob__peterson in the 78th minute with the Whitecaps ahead 2-0 #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: All kinds of forwards out there.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps. David Ousted tries a through ball, but Sebastian Fernandez is caught offside.
Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Johnny Leveron.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: Vancouver has conceded 11 goals in the final 15 minutes plus stoppage time of matches, tied for most in @MLS. 2-0 #VANvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Aurélien Collin (Sporting Kansas City) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Graham Zusi with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Chris Rifer
timelineItems.text: In an otherwise great weekend, a foreboding sign for PTFC with #VWFC emphatically righting the ship by thumping SKC. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 80' SKC's 10 goals in the final 15 minutes of games rank third in @MLS. They need two in order to salvage a point tonight. 2-0 #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 82' Best pressure of the night for SKC. Feilhaber nearly finds Besler, then Zusi nearly finds Collin, but Vancouver clears the danger.

timelineItems.desc: Penalty Vancouver Whitecaps. Omar Salgado draws a foul in the penalty area.
timelineItems.title: PENALTY: Aurelien Collin holds back Salgado in the box

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: MLS champs chasing this one now... They've had more of the ball 2nd half, but no end product as they are known to have... #VANvSKC #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City).
Gershon Koffie (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Penalty Vancouver Whitecaps. Omar Salgado draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Aurélien Collin (Sporting Kansas City) after a foul in the penalty area.

timelineItems.desc: Penalty saved! Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom left
timelineItems.title: PK SAVE: Jon Kempin turns Mattocks’ shot onto the post

timelineItems.comment: Penalty saved! Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom left corner.
Attempt blocked. Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: biag
timelineItems.text: PK !!! #VWFC #VANvSKC http://t.co/Jt9ycE3HMu

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: Penalty for Vancouver. Collin fouls people harder when walking down the street. #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Andy Wild
timelineItems.text: Omar Salgado is one of the least comfortable & unnatural looking players I think I've ever seen #vwfc don't think he'll make the cut

timelineItems.comment: Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Aurélien Collin (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Tyler Million
timelineItems.text: Kempin with the beautiful save on the PK! #SKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Russell Teibert (Vancouver Whitecaps) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right from a direct free kick.

timelineItems.name: Tim
timelineItems.text: MLS should start a worst call of the week contest compete with video. That penalty wins hands down #VANvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City).
Gershon Koffie (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Haley Weatherford
timelineItems.text: Anybody else notice the Whitecaps instantaneous 2 goals, then denial of all four? #SKC #technicaldifficulties

timelineItems.name: Jim Dropinski
timelineItems.text: GREAT PK SAVE @JonKempin21 !!! Welcome to @MLS #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 85' @JonKempin21 SAVES! The @MLS debutant makes a brilliant diving save to deny Mattocks from the penalty spot! #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Cass
timelineItems.text: Sporting Kansas City: home of unimaginable goalkeeper depth. Magnificent save from Kempin. #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: Mattocks struck low to Kempin's right, but SKC's 21-year-old homegrown keeper snuffed it out expertly. #VANvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Gershon Koffie (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Benny Feilhaber curls it just wide

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 90': Salgado makes a nice cross through the #SKC box, but no one can connect on it.

timelineItems.name: biag
timelineItems.text: #CHIvNY game is over and Chicago did their part and soon #VWFC will do theirs for a succesful #TFC weekend.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 90+1' Into the first of five added minutes. SKC trailing 2-0 here in Vancouver... #VANvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Aurélien Collin.

timelineItems.name: Mike McGuire
timelineItems.text: He made a fool outta me earlier when I said #vwfc strikers are poor finishers but Mattocks vindicates me in the end terrible pk

timelineItems.name: Megan Castellan
timelineItems.text: Angry GI Joe! That’s who Kempin looks like. Just figured it out. #SKC

timelineItems.desc: Chance for CJ Sapong (Sporting Kansas City).
timelineItems.title: MISS: CJ Sapong can't finish off a good SKC chance

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 90+3': #VWFC are doing a beautiful job defending the lead in stoppage time

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 94' Feilhaber's shot is blocked, then Sapong's effort deflects inches wide! SKC corner kick... 2-0 #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Jonathan Scott
timelineItems.text: We have had our chances but the ref played a part in this one big time...#VANvSKC

Foul by Omar Salgado (Vancouver Whitecaps).

Second Half ends, Vancouver Whitecaps 2, Sporting Kansas City 0.
Attempt missed. Mikey Lopez (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left.

timelineItems.name: Jarosi Sports Law
timelineItems.text: Dom Dwyer, at a budget number of @ $93K, is on 14 goals for Kansas City. Very shrewd roster-building. #MLS #SKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: Entering the weekend, @gzusi ranked second in @MLS with 3.42 chances created per 90 minutes (minimum 1,000 minutes played). #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: Entering the weekend, VAN’s Pedro Morales ranked T-2nd in assists (8), 3rd in corner kicks (74) and 4th in chances created (55). #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Jacob Martella

timelineItems.name: Jacob Martella
timelineItems.text: #SKC Lineup: Gruenebaum; Juliao, Collin, Besler, Sinovic; Lopez, Claros, Feilhaber; Peterson, Dwyer, Zusi #VANvSKC #MLS

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 4 - The Whitecaps have drawn four consecutive #MLS games for the first time in their franchise history. Level. #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: .@SportingKC (11-5-6, 39 points) with an opportunity to extend their lead in the East, as @dcunited lost to RSL last night. #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: No @MLS club has fewer losses than @WhitecapsFC (6-4-11, 29 points), who are one point outside of the playoff picture in the West. #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: #VWFC Ring of honour inductee Andrea Neil hugging it out with club president Bob Lenarduzzi @ BC Place http://t.co/ICMDbqixMd

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: .@SportingKC in their light blue and indigo-striped kit tonight. They're 4-0-0 in those lovely unis this season. #VANvSKC

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: For Sporting, last match in Nograsscadia of the regular season. They're 1-1-0 on the pretend pitches of the Pacific NW this year.

timelineItems.name: Todd
timelineItems.text: Game On! Go Caps Go! @WhitecapsFC @MLS #vwfc http://t.co/XO5VmGwxnf

timelineItems.name: Megan Castellan
timelineItems.text: Looked back up at TV to see the camera had zoomed in on the AstroTurf, commentators were explaining the blade length. Ok. #vanvskc
